(1,): As a system administrator, I want to process deletions for a specific date, so that the system remains clean and up-to-date As a developer, I want to generate a D file from FABS and FPDS data, so that data can be processed and shared efficiently As a data analyst, I want to derive a funding agency code based on business rules, so that funding sources are accurately categorized As a UX researcher, I want to create a user testing report for agencies, so that usability issues are documented and addressed As a DevOps engineer, I want to configure New Relic monitoring for applications, so that system performance can be tracked As a developer, I want to process flexfields for a submission, so that dynamic data fields are handled correctly
(2,): As a data manager, I want to update the publication status of a FABS submission, so that users can track the progress of their submissions As a data validator, I want to validate FABS files against a schema, so that the data conforms to required standards As a data processor, I want to add GTAS window data to the database, so that financial data is recorded accurately As a data engineer, I want to load historical FABS data into the database, so that historical records are preserved and accessible As a data analyst, I want to derive a PPoP code based on business rules, so that program and project data is categorized correctly
(0,): As a UI designer, I want to redesign the Resources page with new styles, so that the interface is modern and user-friendly As a content manager, I want to update the Help page with new changes, so that users have access to the latest information
